text: Kinza Godfrey Clodumar (8 February 1945 â€“ 29 November 2021) was a Nauruan politician. He was the President of Nauru from 1997 to 1998. Clodumar died on 29 November 2021 at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Presidents of Nauru
title: Kinza Clodumar
